actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

official_title: A bill to amend section 376 of title 28, United States Code, to provide that certain judicial annuities for surviving spouses shall not terminate by reason of remarriage of an annuitant after age sixty.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to provide that certain judicial annuities for surviving spouses shall not terminate by reason of remarriage of an annuitant after age 60.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 376 of title 28, United States Code, to provide that certain judicial annuities for surviving spouses shall not terminate by reason of remarriage of an annuitant after age sixty.
